snippet.title: Resident Evil cloud versions are coming to Nintendo Switch - Nintendo Direct 9.13.2022
snippet.description:
Prepare for the scare – four iconic Resident Evil games are coming to Nintendo Switch as cloud versions, starting with Resident Evil Village Cloud on October 28, 2022!

Resident Evil Biohazard Cloud, Resident Evil 2 Cloud, and Resident Evil 3 Cloud are also coming to Nintendo Switch in 2022!

#ResidentEvil #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
